# LambdaTest: Power Your Software Testing with AI and Cloud

> LambdaTest is an AI Native unified enterprise test execution cloud platform that helps businesses drastically reduce time to market through faster test execution, ensuring quality releases and accelerated digital transformation. It has over 10,000 enterprise customers and over 2 Million users spanning 132 countries.

Enterprises can now choose between live and automated cross-browser testing, live and automated real devices testing, AI-native visual regression testing, AI-native Integrated Test Intelligence, and OTT app testing, ensuring coverage across the entire gamut of omnichannel options.

Our continuous testing cloud comes with innovative features like smart workflows, auto-test grouping, auto-retry, and fail-fast techniques that will do the heavy lifting, allowing testers/developers to concentrate on test creation rather than test execution and orchestration.

Enterprises can decide their deployment mode, be it public cloud, dedicated cloud, or on-premise.

To top it off, enterprises will have access to centralized test analytics and observability that will unify all test execution data and enable informed decision-making.

The digital experience testing cloud will seamlessly fit into the CI/CD pipeline with 120+ integrations across categories like communication, bug tracking, test management, test authoring, and automation.

Also, LambdaTest is SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001, ISO 27017, and ISO 27701 standard certified, and GDPR, CCPA, and HIPAA-ready compliant.

Key terms: Cross Browser Testing, Real Device Cloud, Mobile App Testing, Selenium Grid, Cypress Testing, Playwright Testing, Appium Testing, AI Testing, Accessibility Testing, Visual Regression Testing, Performance Testing, Test Orchestration, Test Intelligence, Test Automation

## LambdaTest Products

- [Kane AI](https://www.lambdatest.com/kane-ai): AI Native QA Agent-as-a-Service platform built on modern Large Language Models (LLMs).Unique approach to plan, author and evolve end to end tests using natural language.
- [Real Device Cloud](https://www.lambdatest.com/real-device-cloud): Test your websites and apps on 10000+ real Android and iOS devices. Eliminate the need of internal device labs, reduce costs, and ensure responsiveness, reliability, and compatibility.
- [Cross Browser Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/cross-browser-testing): Perform interactive testing on websites across 3,000+ environments and browsers.
- [Automation Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/automation-cloud): Run Selenium, Cypress, Puppeteer, Playwright, and Appium tests on secure, scalable, fully-managed cloud infrastructure.
- [HyperExecute](https://www.lambdatest.com/hyperexecute): Upto 70% faster AI native test orchestration cloud. Smart test execution with AI-Native test prioritization and automation.
- [Visual Regression Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/visual-regression-testing): AI-Native Visual Regression Testing Cloud ensures UI perfection, automating across browsers, apps, websites, and PDFs for swift and efficient outcomes.
- [Test Manager](https://www.lambdatest.com/test-manager): Streamline test authoring, management, triggering, and reporting with unified Test Manager. Elevate efficiency across all testing phases.
- [Accessibility Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/learning-hub/accessibility-testing): Ensure compliance with WCAG, ADA, and other accessibility standards.
- [Performance Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/performance-testing): Run your Performance Tests with ease on HyperExecute. Stable load generation, Scalable Infra, Multi-region load distribution and much more.
- [LT Browser](https://www.lambdatest.com/lt-browser): LT Browser 2.0 is a Chromium-based, FREE-to-use browser allowing you to build, test, and debug mobile websites and web applications across 50+ device viewports.
- [LT Debug Chrome Extension](https://www.lambdatest.com/lt-debug): Debug web pages on-the-fly with nine essential debugging tools.This Chrome extension makes debugging any web page a breeze.
- [Test Analytics](https://www.lambdatest.com/test-analytics): Assess high-impact quality issues with detailed Test Analytics & Observability Suite. 
- [LambdaTest Professional Services](https://www.lambdatest.com/professional-services): Lean on LambdaTest experts to help you with your end to end sprints. Leverage LambdaTest QA services and ship with confidence.
- [Performance Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/performance-testing): Run your Performance Tests with ease on HyperExecute. Stable load generation, Scalable Infra, Multi-region load distribution and much more.

## Industries that LambdaTest Serves

- [Insurance](https://www.lambdatest.com/insurance): Leverage LambdaTest's Unified Testing Cloud tailored for the insurance sector to accelerate digital transformation, ensuring faster releases and seamless, high-quality customer experiences.
- [Banking & Finance](https://www.lambdatest.com/finance): Empower your banking and finance solutions with LambdaTest's Unified Testing Cloud to enhance digital experiences, speed up releases, and drive innovation in a rapidly evolving industry.
- [Healthcare](https://www.lambdatest.com/healthcare): Unlock the power of LambdaTest's Unified Testing Cloud for the healthcare industry, enabling faster, reliable releases and transforming your digital services to provide an exceptional user experience.
- [Travel & Hospitality](https://www.lambdatest.com/travel-and-hospitality): Enhance your travel and hospitality offerings with LambdaTest's Unified Testing Cloud, delivering flawless digital experiences, faster time-to-market, and seamless user interactions.
- [Media & Entertainment](https://www.lambdatest.com/media-and-entertainment): Drive success in the media and entertainment industry with LambdaTest's Unified Testing Cloud, enabling rapid releases and ensuring the highest quality digital experiences for your audience.
- [Retail](https://www.lambdatest.com/retail): Revolutionize the retail sector with LambdaTest's Unified Testing Cloud, offering faster, quality-driven releases and transforming your digital storefront for an exceptional customer journey.

- [FAQs](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/faq/): Get answers to frequently asked questions about LambdaTest's products, data security, pricing, and more.
- [Web Technologies Browser Compatibility](https://www.lambdatest.com/web-technologies): Access the most comprehensive database of browser compatibility for major web technologies, including CSS, HTML, JS, and more.
- [Automation Testing Advisor](https://www.lambdatest.com/automation-testing-advisor): Unlock the ultimate resource for automation testing, providing expert insights and free community knowledge.
- [Free Online Tools](https://www.lambdatest.com/free-online-tools): Explore a wide range of free online utilities and libraries to assist developers, testers, and designers in their day-to-day tasks.
- [Mobile Testing Advisor](https://www.lambdatest.com/mobile-testing-advisor): Discover valuable resources on mobile testing across all major devices, including Apple, Google, Samsung, and more.
- [Billing & Plans](https://www.lambdatest.com/pricing): Learn about LambdaTest's subscription plans and payment options to choose the best fit for your needs.

## Account Actions

- [Sign Up](https://accounts.lambdatest.com/register): Sign up with LambdaTest and accelerate your release velocity by running manual and automated browser testing in parallel across 3000+ browsers and operating systems online. Try now for free!.
- [Log In](https://accounts.lambdatest.com/login): Access your LambdaTest dashboard.
- [Schedule a Demo](https://www.lambdatest.com/demo): Schedule a demo to see how you can perform cross browser testing with LambdaTest. Our experts will help you with a detailed walkthrough of LambdaTest platform.
- [Contact LambdaTest](https://www.lambdatest.com/contact-us): Get help from the LambdaTest team for queries and issues.

## Developer Resources

- [API Docs](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/api-doc/): Access complete documentation to integrate LambdaTest API into your automation workflows..
- [Selenium Grid](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/getting-started-with-lambdatest-automation/): Learn how to run Selenium tests on LambdaTest's cloud grid for parallel execution and faster results.
- [Cypress Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/getting-started-with-cypress-testing/): Step-by-step guide for running Cypress tests on LambdaTest for seamless cross-browser testing.
- [Playwright Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/playwright-testing/): Instructions to run Playwright automation tests on LambdaTest's cloud infrastructure for scalable, efficient testing.
- [Puppeteer Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/puppeteer-testing/): Execute Puppeteer tests effortlessly on LambdaTest's 40+ real browsers and operating systems for precise results.
- [k6 Browser Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/k6-browser-testing/): Combine browser automation with k6 for end-to-end testing and frontend performance monitoring with browser-level APIs.
- [Appium Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/getting-started-with-appium-testing/): Run automated tests for Android and iOS apps on 3000+ real browsers and OS combinations on LambdaTest's cloud.
- [Espresso Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/getting-started-with-espresso-testing/): Execute automation tests using the Espresso framework on LambdaTest's real device grid of 3000+ devices and OS combinations.
- [XCUI Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/getting-started-with-xcuitest/): Master XCUITest automation on real iOS devices with LambdaTest's cloud-based testing platform.
- [Flutter Dart Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/getting-started-with-flutter-dart-android-automation/): Learn to run your first Flutter Dart test on LambdaTest's Real Device Cloud, supporting 10000+ real Android and iOS devices.
- [App Automation Using Emulators and Simulators](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/app-automation-on-emulators-simulators/): Run automated app tests using Emulators and Simulators on LambdaTest's cloud environment for comprehensive testing.
- [Getting Started with HyperExecute](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/getting-started-with-hyperexecute/): Accelerate web automation tests with HyperExecute's Matrix and Auto-Split strategies for faster Selenium testing.
- [Test Insights](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/app-automation-on-emulators-simulators/): Improve test efficiency with Test Insights - visualize results, track progress, and gain actionable insights to optimize quality.
- [Real Device App Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/app-testing-on-real-devices/): Seamlessly test mobile apps on 3000+ real devices, selecting from various OS versions and regions for precise manual app testing.
- [Mobile App Real Time Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/getting-started-with-mobile-app-real-time-testing/): Test mobile apps in real-time across different devices and OS versions with LambdaTest's real-device testing capabilities.
- [Getting started with KaneAI](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/getting-started-with-kane-ai/): Discover KaneAI, LambdaTest's AI-powered testing assistant that simplifies web, mobile, and cloud app testing for faster and more accurate results.
- [Visual Regression tests with SmartUI](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/smart-visual-regression-testing/): Automate UI change detection with SmartUI for precise visual regression testing, ensuring seamless collaboration and scalability.
- [Test Manager](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/test-manager/): Streamline your testing process with Test Manager - manage tests, track results, and access real-time insights for enhanced efficiency.
- [Accessibility Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/support/docs/accessibility-testing/): Ensure your digital products are accessible with comprehensive accessibility testing and improvements using LambdaTest's Accessibility DevTool.
- [Automation Capabilities Generator](https://www.lambdatest.com/capabilities-generator/): Configure automated tests with LambdaTest's real-device capabilities generator, enabling you to create browser-specific capabilities for enhanced test accuracy.

- [LambdaTest Blog](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/): Get the latest insights on software testing, automation, and QA best practices from LambdaTest.
- [Using ChatGPT for Test Automation](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/using-chatgpt-for-test-automation/): Learn how to leverage ChatGPT for test automation, enhancing your test processes and efficiency.
- [ChatGPT Prompts for Software Testing](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/chatgpt-prompts-for-software-testing/): Discover useful ChatGPT prompts designed to streamline and automate various aspects of software testing.
- [Emulators for Chromebook](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/emulators-for-chromebook/): Explore the best emulators for testing apps on Chromebook and enhance your cross-platform testing strategies.
- [Android Emulators for iOS](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/android-emulators-for-ios/): Learn how to use Android emulators for iOS devices to ensure seamless cross-platform app testing.
- [Android Emulators for Mac](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/android-emulators-for-mac/): Discover the top Android emulators available for Mac to enhance mobile app testing across different platforms.
- [Desktop Site on Android](https://www.lambdatest.com/learning-hub/desktop-site-on-android/): Learn how to view and test desktop sites on Android devices to ensure compatibility and usability.
- [Complete Guide for Using XPath in Selenium with Examples](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/complete-guide-for-using-xpath-in-selenium-with-examples/): A detailed guide to mastering XPath in Selenium, including practical examples to improve your test automation.
- [Best JavaScript Frameworks](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/best-javascript-frameworks/): Explore the best JavaScript frameworks for modern web development and automate your web testing with these tools.
- [Android Emulators for iOS](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/android-emulators-for-ios/): Learn the best practices and tools to run Android emulators on iOS devices for efficient cross-platform testing.
- [Playwright Interview Questions](https://www.lambdatest.com/learning-hub/playwright-interview-questions): Prepare for your Playwright interview with a comprehensive list of questions and tips to ace your testing career.
- [Cypress vs Playwright](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/cypress-vs-playwright/): Compare Cypress and Playwright, two of the most popular frameworks for automated testing, and learn which one is right for your projects.
- [Cypress Interview Questions](https://www.lambdatest.com/learning-hub/cypress-interview-questions): Get ready for your next interview with key Cypress interview questions that test your knowledge of this automation tool.
- [TestNG Interview Questions](https://www.lambdatest.com/learning-hub/testng-interview-questions): Prepare for TestNG-related job interviews with common questions, best practices, and tips to stand out.
- [Best CSS Button Hover Effects](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/best-css-button-hover-effects/): Learn how to design the best hover effects for your buttons using CSS to enhance user experience and interactivity.
- [Bootstrap Carousel Examples](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/bootstrap-carousel-examples/): Check out various examples of Bootstrap carousels to make your website more engaging and interactive.
- [Emulators for Chromebook](https://www.lambdatest.com/blog/emulators-for-chromebook/): Explore the best emulators for testing on Chromebook and how they can streamline your cross-device testing process.

## Events & Community

- [LambdaTest Community](https://community.lambdatest.com/): Engage with a vibrant community of testers, developers, and industry experts. Share insights, ask questions, and collaborate on testing solutions.
- [Events](https://www.lambdatest.com/events): Discover upcoming LambdaTest events, webinars, and conferences. Connect with experts, learn testing strategies, and stay ahead in software development.
- [TestMu Conference](https://www.lambdatest.com/testmuconf-2025): Join over 30,000+ professionals for TestMu Conference 2025! This virtual event will redefine the future of software testing. Attend over 30 sessions, workshops, and tutorials led by 40+ speakers, covering key trends, strategies, and innovations. Register for free now - 19-21 August 2025.
- [Webinars](https://www.lambdatest.com/webinars): Register for live, expert-led webinars on software testing, automation, and emerging technologies. Learn directly from the best in the industry.
- [Voices of Community](https://www.lambdatest.com/voices-of-community): Tune in to our monthly live talk show where LambdaTest hosts leading testing and QA experts. Engage in Q&A sessions and dive into relevant testing topics and trends.
- [XP Series](https://www.lambdatest.com/xp-series): Join our Experience (XP) Series Webinars to hear from top technology experts and leaders in the testing & QA ecosystem. Explore the latest testing trends, automation, quality engineering, and digital transformation insights.
- [Velocity Tour](https://www.lambdatest.com/velocity-tour): LambdaTest's Velocity Tour brings together CXOs, testing experts, and technology leaders. Gain valuable insights on agile testing, enterprise automation, and digital transformation. Connect with peers and enjoy an exclusive networking event. Register now!
- [LambdaTest BootCamp](https://www.lambdatest.com/bootcamp/): Dive deep into technical sessions that showcase how to accelerate your testing process using LambdaTest's Continuous Testing Cloud. Register for live, hands-on training and enhance your testing expertise.
- [Spartans Summit 2025](https://www.lambdatest.com/spartans-summit-2025): Join the testing revolution at Spartans Summit 2025! Connect with QA changemakers, share insights, and drive innovation.
- [Open Source](https://www.lambdatest.com/open-source): Learn about LambdaTest's involvement in the open-source community and how we contribute to the testing ecosystem.
- [LambdaTest Grants for Open Source](https://www.lambdatest.com/open-source-grants/): To support innovation in software testing frameworks and toolsets, we are excited to announce a $250,000 grant for open source projects and contributors building solutions for the QA and Testing community.
